sn35.149:1.3: katama ca sa, bhikkhave, nibbanasappaya patipada?
sn35.149:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhum anattati passati, rupa anattati passati, cakkhuvinnanam anattati passati, cakkhusamphasso anattati passati, yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anattati passati …pe…
sn35.149:1.5: mano anattati passati, dhamma anattati passati, manovinnanam anattati passati, manosamphasso anattati passati, yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anattati passati.
sn35.149:1.6: Ayam kho sa, bhikkhave, nibbanasappaya patipada”ti.
